message.raw:
Modified relevant Devices' generate_code methods to use get, and BLACS tabs to
use get from labscript_utils.properties.

Bugfixes (regression):
   * removed keep_names from @set_passed_properties in PhaseMatrixQuickSyn
   * reinstated update_mode to connection_table_properties (it was missing from
@set_passed_properties).

Still require modification to BLACS Connection object (get method
needs to use new deserialisation) for these changes to work.
